channel.title: Jekyll on Carpentry at the University of Oslo
channel.description: Recent content in Jekyll on Carpentry at the University of Oslo

item.title: <Canceled> Workalong - Creating Websites with Jekyll
item.description: Session leader: Naoe Tatara Level: beginner When: 2020-04-16 Time: 16:00-18:00 Location: Niels Henrik Abels hus Room 209 What’s happening? Due to Covid-19 spreading and closed buildings of UiO and unknown level of interest, the session is canceled. It will be held in future, either online or in person, when the situation gets better and there is enough interest. We meet and together create a website using Jekyll. We will learn a bit about web design and web development.
